62fde09df4e41bb302fba9c118fe703c4ea4c613.name: extension-2.js

240.title: (UTAG) is_start_of_session
240.description: (Cookie) A flag that indicates whether or not a page view is the start of a session. A value of 1 means yes and 0 means no.
240.name: utag_main__ss

241.name: utag_main__pn
241.title: (UTAG) session_page_view_count
241.description: (Cookie) The number of pages viewed during the current session

242.title: (UTAG) session_count
242.description: (Cookie) The number of sessions for this unique visitor
242.name: utag_main__sn

243.description: (Cookie) A unique identifier for each visitor
243.title: (UTAG) visitor_id
243.name: utag_main_v_id

244.description: (Cookie) The Unix/Epoch time stamp in milliseconds.
244.title: (UTAG) timestamp
244.name: utag_main__st

245.title: (UTAG) session_id
245.description: (Cookie) A unique identifier for the session.
245.name: utag_main_ses_id

246.name: ut.event
246.description: The name of the event being tracked. (view, link, etc.)
246.title: (UTAG) event

247.title: (UTAG) account
247.description: The account associated with this utag.js file.
247.name: ut.account

248.name: ut.profile
248.description: The profile associated with this utag.js file.
248.title: (UTAG) profile

249.name: ut.env
249.title: (UTAG) environment
249.description: The publish environment associated with this utag.js file.

250.name: ut.version
250.title: (UTAG) version
250.description: The version number of the utag.js file. This is a combination of the utag.js template version number and the time stamp of its publish.

251.description: The top-level domain of the currently loaded web page.
251.title: (UTAG) domain
251.name: ut.domain

254.name: Account Value Strings
254.description: Should contain account numbers and their value band

255.name: Active browser type
255.description: The browser actively being used by the visitor

256.name: Active browser version
256.description: The browser version actively being used by the visitor

257.name: Active device
257.description: The device actively being used by the visitor

258.name: Active operating system
258.description: The operating system actively being used by the visitor

259.name: Active platform
259.description: The platform actively being used by the visitor

268.name: Direct visit
268.description: The user navigated directly to the site

269.name: Entry URL
269.description: URL of the first page visited

270.name: Event count
270.description: Total number of events in visit

271.name: Exit URL
271.description: URL of the last page visited

272.name: Fan
272.description: More than two total visits and more direct visits than refers

275.name: Frequent visitor
275.description: Two or more average visits per week

277.name: Google GID
277.description: From the Google Cookie Match, saved here as string

280.name: GUID - Compromised profile and a new visit [bln]

settings.origin_name: GUID - Compromised profile and a new visit [bln]

281.name: GUID - Count Has Changed This Visit

settings.origin_name: GUID - Count Has Changed This Visit

284.name: GUID - Incomplete Profile
284.description: Should not use this profile, it's been used on a shared device and only contains partial information

287.name: Has Cookie Sync ID - With Rule

settings.origin_name: Has Cookie Sync ID - With Rule

288.name: Has Cookie Sync ID - Without Rule

settings.origin_name: Has Cookie Sync ID - Without Rule

302.name: Lifetime browser types used (favorite)
302.description: Captures the favorite metric for Metric Set: Lifetime browser types used

303.name: Lifetime browser versions used (favorite)
303.description: Captures the favorite metric for Metric Set: Lifetime browser versions used

304.name: Lifetime devices used (favorite)
304.description: Captures the favorite metric for Metric Set: Lifetime devices used

305.name: Lifetime event count
305.description: Total number of events triggered by user

306.name: Lifetime operating systems used (favorite)
306.description: Captures the favorite metric for Metric Set: Lifetime operating systems used

308.name: Lifetime order total by partner name (favorite)
308.description: Captures the favorite number for Tally: Lifetime order total by partner name

settings.origin_name: Lifetime order total by partner name (favorite)

309.name: Lifetime platforms used (favorite)
309.description: Captures the favorite metric for Metric Set: Lifetime platforms used

310.name: LIfetime Test Stream Values (favorite)
310.description: Captures the favorite number for Tally: LIfetime Test Stream Values

311.name: Lifetime visit count
311.description: Total number of times user has visited site

313.name: Most Recent GCLID
313.description: This setup ignores the edge case where a user could click two ads from this campaign within the same session - it will only send the last GCLID in those cases.

314.name: Most Recent GCLID has changed this visit

settings.origin_name: Most Recent GCLID has changed this visit

319.name: Product Prices Purchases - Last Order Imported (favorite)
319.description: Captures the favorite number for Tally: Product Prices Purchases - Last Order Imported

settings.origin_name: Product Prices Purchases - Last Order Imported (favorite)

320.name: Product Purchase Count (Lifetime) (favorite)
320.description: Captures the favorite number for Tally: Product Purchase Count (Lifetime)

322.name: Referred visit
322.description: The user was referred from another site

325.name: Spend per Product (Lifetime) (favorite)
325.description: Captures the favorite number for Tally: Spend per Product (Lifetime)

330.name: Test Tally (favorite)
330.description: Captures the favorite number for Tally: Test Tally

331.name: test_tiq_string values (favorite)
331.description: Captures the favorite number for Tally: test_tiq_string values

332.name: test_udo_string values (favorite)
332.description: Captures the favorite number for Tally: test_udo_string values

336.name: Total time spent on site in minutes
336.description: Sum duration of all user visits

settings.origin_name: Total time spent on site in minutes

337.name: Unbadged
337.description: The visitor has not been assigned any badges
